events: You stumble across a shelf lined with various flasks, now yours for the taking.
Nestled beneath the moss you find a satchel, brimming with glass bottles pulsing faintly.
You hear a soft clink, and spot some potions tucked beneath old bones.
The remnants of an alchemistâ€™s workstation lie scattered across the floor.
A few potions remain still vibrant, still volatile.
A skeletal hand juts from a collapsed tunnel wall, clutching a pouch.
You hear a soft clink, and spot a potion tucked beneath old bones.
A ritual circle stains the floor in dried ink and ash.
Scattered around its edges are several potions, seeming to have been placed deliberately...
